publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1957 Iain Smith on behalf of the Procedures Committee: A New Procedure for Members’ Bills—That the Parliament notes the Procedures Committee’s 6th Report, 2004 (Session 2), A New Procedure for Members’ Bills (SP Paper 193), and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 12 November 2004 but with new Rule 9.14A having effect only for as long as at least one Member’s Bill introduced before that date remains in progress. Supported by: Karen Gillon*

S2M-1957 Iain Smith on behalf of the Procedures Committee: A New Procedure for Members’ Bills—That the Parliament notes the Procedures Committee’s 6th Report, 2004 (Session 2), A New Procedure for Members’ Bills (SP Paper 193), and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 12 November 2004 but with new Rule 9.14A having effect only for as long as at least one Member’s Bill introduced before that date remains in progress. Supported by: Karen Gillon
